title: Panel, 1938-57-1205, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: satin weave with supplementary weft (brocading)
description: Long vertical panel composed of two pieces having four selvages present. Pale blue satin ground with a brocaded design of single large-scale palm tree with spreading foliage and a few pendant blossoms at top. A few flowering bushes on a hillock at the base of the tree. Bird and large insect near center of the trunk.
